summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Atlanta Luxury Chauffeur Service website. All core functionality working including booking flow, Stripe integration, availability checking with 1.5hr buffer, and all 5 pages. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend UI/UX excellent with luxury design implementation.

minor_issues.issue: Returns status code 200 instead of 201 for successful creation
minor_issues.impact: No functional impact, just HTTP status code convention

passed_tests: All 5 pages load correctly (Home, Services, Booking, About, Contact)
Navigation works on desktop and mobile
Auto-calculation of duration, price, and 50% deposit
Time slot availability checking with 1.5hr buffer
All backend API endpoints (12/12 tests passed)
Luxury design implementation with Playfair Display + Manrope fonts
Trust indicators and fleet preview sections

success_percentage.integration: 100% (booking flow, payment, contact form all working)
